hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated with the same chain of transmitters with the difference that here instead of" Urwat al-Bariqi" there is" Urwa b. ja'd

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخَيْلُ فِي نَوَاصِيهَا الْخَيْرُ إِلَى يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of horses; "Goodness is tied to their Forelocks."
